content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I would like to know what you are willing to pay per month for this 25 square meter space.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 600 Euros per month. Is that acceptable to you?

Please let me know if you need any additional information.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. This is a very competitive price for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim. However, I am willing to consider your offer. Before we agree on a final price, could you please provide me with some additional information such as your expected length of stay, and if you plan on making any changes to the apartment during your tenancy?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I plan to stay for 1 year. I will not make any changes to the apartment.

I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your agreement, Nesibe. I am happy to rent this apartment to you for 600 Euros per month. I will provide you with a lease agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of our agreement. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
